alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Greene; Ozark; Taney; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:21AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN OZARK...WEBSTER...WESTERN DOUGLAS...EASTERN TANEY AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CST... At 1220 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Battlefield to near Highlandville to 6 miles northeast of Merriam Woods to near Forsyth to 8 miles northeast of Omaha. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Republic, Bull Shoals Lake, Marshfield, Battlefield, Rogersville, Ava, Strafford, Seymour, Fordland, Duncan, Brookline, Diggins, Theodosia, Pontiac, Sundown, Turners, Protem, Thornfield, and Rome. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 69, between mile markers 83 and 85, and between mile markers 87 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
